description: A representation of groupings of material definitions for a definite purpose such as manufacturing operations definition, scheduling, capability, and performance shall be presented as a material class. A material definition shall belong to zero or more material classes.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: IsAssembledFrom
contents.description: This parent material class is whole of the child material class(s) as the part.

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The material class property(s) of this material class.

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the material class.

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: assemblyType
contents.description: Defines the type of the assembly

enumValues.name: physical
enumValues.description: the components of the assembly are physically connected or in the same area

enumValues.name: logical
enumValues.description: the components of the assembly are not necessarily physically connected or in the same area

contents.name: assemblyRelationship
contents.description: Defines the type of the relationships

enumValues.name: permanent
enumValues.description: an assembly that is not intended to be split during the production process

enumValues.name: transient
enumValues.description: a temporary assembly using during production, such as a pallet of different materials or a batch kit
